about.resume: A creative developer and designer living in Brazil - SP, with over 5 years of experience in cross-platform software development.
about.complete_resume: Hello, my name is Gustavo. I am a creative developer and designer with over 5 years of experience in cross-platform software development. I love discovering new stories and ideas. Each project is an idea, and each idea is a story ready to be told to the world. My job is to listen to your stories and help you spread them globally. In my free time, I love reading, watching new series, and creating new tools to assist me.
